item.description:
Please RSVP!

We have started the IBD Series of 13 Lessons again!!  Don't miss them!

Lesson 4: Using Chart Patterns for Historical Precedent

This lesson will help you find winning stocks by comparing chart patterns of current stocks to those of stocks that have been big winners historically.  Chart patterns represent human behavior.  To paraphrase Mark Twain, "History may not repeat itself, but it certainly rhymes." 

 

Kier McDonough is the founder and portfolio manager of brìgos capital management and has over 28 years of experience as an investment professional. Kier was also a workshop instructor for Investor’s Business Daily for three years, teaching their introductory and intermediate “How to Make Money in Stocks” seminars to individuals nationwide. He was recently profiled in How to Make Money in Stocks: Success Stories.

He will also talk about the market and examine charts of your stock picks.


Note: A link to the power point slides will be sent out to all who RSVP after each lesson.

Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

These meetings are free of charge.

There is free parking in the lot next to the building and also one block over on Hayward St.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD Lesson 4: Using Chart Patterns for Historical Precedent
